books.title: The Little Book of Mental Health
books.author: Somerset NHS
books.summary: A simple and friendly guide covering stress, anxiety, depression, self-esteem, and emotional grounding.

books.title: Overcoming Depression: A Cognitive-Behavioral Approach
books.author: National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH)
books.summary: A CBT-based guide developed by mental-health professionals to help users reduce depression and negative thinking.

books.title: Mindfulness-Based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT) Workbook
books.author: Teasdale, Williams, Segal — Free Workbook Release
books.summary: A practical workbook teaching mindfulness and CBT exercises for stress, anxiety, and depression.

books.title: Self-Esteem: A Proven Program of Cognitive Techniques
books.author: McKay & Fanning — Public PDF Release
books.summary: A workbook-style guide that improves self-esteem and emotional resilience using CBT techniques.

books.title: Coping With Loneliness
books.author: U.S. Department of Health
books.summary: A short and practical guide to understanding loneliness and applying healthy coping strategies.

books.title: Psychology (OpenStax, 2e)
books.author: OpenStax
books.summary: A comprehensive, peer-reviewed introductory psychology textbook covering cognition, emotion, development, personality, social behavior, and disorders.

books.title: A Textbook of Human Psychology
books.author: H. J. Eysenck & D. F. Wilson
books.summary: A classic, broad survey of human psychology topics — perception, learning, memory, emotion, personality and individual differences.

books.title: Fundamentals of Psychological Disorders
books.author: Washington State University Open Text
books.summary: An open-text introduction to psychological disorders, symptoms, and basic approaches to treatment — useful for understanding clinical presentations.

books.title: Positive Psychology: Theory, Research and Applications
books.author: Ilona Boniwell & Susan Hefferon
books.summary: An open-access text introducing positive psychology concepts — well-being, resilience, self-esteem, and evidence-based interventions to improve mental health.

books.title: Social Psychology (open resources compilation)
books.author: Various / Open Text
books.summary: A collection of open-source chapters on social influence, attitudes, group behavior and interpersonal processes that impact stress, anger and self-worth.

books.title: The Science of Well-Being
books.author: Laurie R. Santos (Yale University)
books.summary: A research-backed guide to improving happiness, building positive habits, reducing stress, and transforming daily life through mindset shifts.

books.title: Authentic Happiness Handbook
books.author: Martin E. P. Seligman (Positive Psychology Center)
books.summary: A practical introduction to positive psychology, teaching gratitude, purpose, strengths, and emotional flourishing.

books.title: Building Self-Esteem: A Self-Help Guide
books.author: Carol Vivyan (Counselling Resource)
books.summary: A simple, powerful workbook based on CBT techniques for improving self-worth, reducing negative self-talk, and managing anxiety.

books.title: A Guide to Stress Management
books.author: WHO / Public Health Resource
books.summary: A clear and practical guide that teaches how to manage stress, build resilience, develop healthy habits, and restore mental energy.

books.title: Improving Emotional Intelligence
books.author: Mark Craemer (Open Education Resource)
books.summary: A transformation-focused workbook that enhances emotional awareness, relationships, self-management, and resilience.

books.title: The Mindfulness Workbook
books.author: New Harbinger Publications (Free Release Sample)
books.summary: A practical workbook that teaches mindfulness, breathing techniques, and awareness practices to reduce stress and anxiety.

books.title: Mindfulness for Beginners
books.author: Tara Brach (Open Teaching Material)
books.summary: A simple introduction to mindfulness practices that help with calming the mind, reducing emotional reactivity, and improving focus.

books.title: Deep Sleep Meditation Guide
books.author: MindWell Community Resources
books.summary: A calming meditation-based guide designed to improve sleep quality, reduce night-time anxiety, and relax the mind.

books.title: Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR) Manual
books.author: University of Massachusetts Center for Mindfulness
books.summary: The original MBSR program manual focusing on meditation, awareness, and emotional regulation for stress relief.

books.title: Managing Anger with Mindfulness
books.author: Centre for Clinical Interventions (CCI)
books.summary: A workbook offering mindfulness strategies to manage irritation, anger bursts, emotional triggers, and reactive behavior.

books.title: Recovery Workbook: Mental Health Self-Help Guide
books.author: Pathways to Recovery Project (SAMHSA)
books.summary: A powerful recovery workbook designed to help individuals rebuild identity, self-esteem, and emotional stability after depression or trauma.

books.title: Overcoming Anger: A Self-Help Guide
books.author: Centre for Clinical Interventions (CCI)
books.summary: A structured workbook that teaches anger recognition, emotional regulation, triggers, and coping techniques using CBT.

books.title: Depression: A Guide for Recovery
books.author: Queensland Health
books.summary: A clear and compassionate workbook helping users manage depressive episodes, challenge negative thinking, and rebuild emotional strength.

books.title: Loneliness & How to Cope
books.author: Health Missouri (Public Health Dept.)
books.summary: A practical guide explaining loneliness, its emotional effects, and step-by-step strategies to reconnect and heal.

books.title: Self-Esteem: A Proven Program of Cognitive Techniques
books.author: McKay & Fanning (Open Release)
books.summary: A complete self-esteem workbook offering CBT tools to rebuild confidence, identity, emotional resilience, and inner strength.

books.title: Improving Communication Skills
books.author: Open University
books.summary: A practical guide to understanding communication styles, emotional expression, active listening, and healthier relationship patterns.

books.title: Healthy Relationships Toolkit
books.author: U.S. Department of Health
books.summary: A friendly workbook teaching boundary-setting, emotional safety, conflict management, and supportive communication.

books.title: Managing Emotions in Relationships
books.author: Centre for Clinical Interventions (CCI)
books.summary: A CBT-based guide to handling anger, emotional triggers, defensive communication, and relationship tension.

books.title: Building Assertiveness Skills
books.author: Therapist Aid (Open Resource)
books.summary: A short, skill-based workbook that improves confidence, self-esteem, boundary-setting, and honest communication.

Feel Better in 15 Minutes - Guided Mood Reset
